articles.author: Matt Ehalt
articles.title: NBC's Peter King announces retirement after 44 years covering NFL - New York Post
articles.description: The sportswriting legend announced in his “Football Morning in America” column for NBC that he is hanging up the pen after 44 years.
articles.content:
